title: Indecisive Executioner

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Your target will be secretly marked the next day, and the mark will go away at the end of the day.

> You can never mark the same person twice.

> Nothing can stop your marking ability from successfully marking the intended target, the only exception being the attribute before this.

desc:
Post 1512
*"You have committed unforgivable crimes, I will stop at nothing to make sure you are hanged for the whole town to see... Actually, nevermind, I think I'll get this random person executed instead."*
